adviseScripts.text: Teacher! Let's eat together!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: What are you in the mood for?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Mild croquettes.
Spicy croquettes.
I love those!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I could eat them every day.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Um... I can't really eat spicy food.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: But, if you're there with me, it should be okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I eat croquettes with N102.
Teacher, my head is killing me.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: It's throbbing...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: D-do you think there's something wrong with me?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Let me take you to the hospital.
Let me feel your forehead.
H-hospital?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I-I'm okay. I feel a lot better now.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Hee hee...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: It feels really nice when you touch my forehead. I feel better already.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Thanks!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I observe N102's condition for a while longer.
While I was on my way here, someone seemed to recognize me.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: But, I'd never met them before! I have no memory of them.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Do... do you think I did something wrong?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: No. I'm sure they were just mistaken.
If you see that person later, you should apologize.
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: They seemed so happy to see me.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Well... if you say so, then I'm sure that's the case.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Yes, I will.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: But...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I've already forgotten what they look like.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I spend some quiet time together with N102.
Teacher, they've come out with jalapeño croquettes!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I thought it was too spicy before, but I'm going to give it another try!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Wait, have I ever tried jalapeño croquettes before?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: We've had them together before.
How could you have? They were only added to the menu today.
R-really?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I'm sorry. I can't seem to remember anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: N-next time I won't forget!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I guess that makes sense...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Ha ha, maybe I dreamt about it because I was so excited!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Let's go!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I spend time eating croquettes with N102.
I want to go up to the surface as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: All of that wide-open space, and the sky doesn't even crackle.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: And I want to see the ocean!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Okay. Let's go together sometime soon.
You went there yesterday.
Okie-dokie!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: But, I'll need a swimsuit to go into the ocean, won't I?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: What kind of swimsuit do you think I should get?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: What?!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text:
No way!
I've been underground ever since I was born!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text:
... Oh! Teacher!
You're just teasing me, aren't you?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with N102 about the surface.
It's going to rain tomorrow!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Don't forget your umbrella!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text:
As for me, I'm gonna let myself get caught in the rain.
I've never been drenched by the rain before!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Getting wet is not a good feeling.
You'll catch a cold.
Well, that's what you say.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: But I still want to see how it feels for myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Ha ha! I'll be fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Can I tell you a secret? I've never caught a cold before.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Come to think of it, I've never been sick, period! So, it'll be fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with N102 about the weather.
Teacher, do I look like a celebrity or something?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: All of these people seem to recognize me.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: But, I've never seen them before in my life!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Maybe you've got an irresistible star quality to you.
Actually, you do resemble this one celebrity...
Um... Teacher... you shouldn't say stuff like that...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: It's a little... embarrassing.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: But... it makes me feel good at the same time! Hee hee.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Wow! I hope I get to meet them!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I bet we'd surprise the heck out of each other!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with N102 about TV shows.

Um...
Ummm...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: This show I'm watching has a male protagonist with amnesia, and he was getting mad at the female protagonist.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I felt so bad for them both.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: That's a very sad story.
What's so sad about it?
That's how I felt.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: If I ever got amnesia,
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I don't know what I'd do.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: You really don't think it's sad?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: No, because they're working together to rebuild what they lost.
... Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I'm not sure why, but I think I get it. Kind of.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with N102 about her favorite shows.
Teacher, have you ever been to Royal Road?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I heard everything there is so shiny, and there's people all around.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: And they also have a croquette store!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Do you want to go together?
We go to that croquette store all the time.
Sure!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I love croquettes!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I'm curious what flavors they have!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Huh? What?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Teacher, you're not making any sense.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I've never been to a croquette store with you.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I go to the croquette store with N102.
Teacher, I just found out what a squad is.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: It's a group of teammates who work together on missions.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Do you think I'll ever be part of a squad like that one day?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: It will happen someday.
We already are a squad.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Teammates... I'd like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Hey, you're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: We're a squad, too!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Hee hee. So, I already have teammates of my very own!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I explain our squad to N102 in detail.
Can I ask you, what kind of music do you like?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I'm utterly clueless when it comes to music.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I'd love to hear your recommendations.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Hum the tune for her.
Simply say the title of the song.
Wow...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: It's a beautiful song.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: You have a lovely singing voice as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: This is my new favorite song!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: The title alone doesn't give me much to go on...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Either way, I'll give it a listen later!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: N102 and I talk about our favorite songs.
This is the first time we're really spoken one-on-one!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: So, what are we supposed to talk about?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Anything you want.
If you're comfortable with it, you can share any concerns you have with me.
Let me think...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Anything at all?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: All right, I'll tell you how my day went!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... Nothing's really on my mind right now...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Should I be concerned about something?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: N102 and I have a wonderful time getting to know each other better.
I'm dying to go play the claw machines.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Can I, teacher? Can I?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: We'll go after we're done talking.
Let's finish talking first, then we'll see.
Wow!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: You'll come with me?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: All right then, let's hurry and get this over with!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Aw man... I can't afford to be late...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Let's hurry and get this over with then!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: N102 and I have another meaningful conversation.
I went to the library for the first time today.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: They said there was a book that was borrowed under my name!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: What could have happened?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: You must have borrowed a book once before.
There's someone out there with the same name as you.
Huh? Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: But today was my first time going to the library.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: There must have been some kind of mistake.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Whoa!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Someone with the same name as me!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I'd like to meet them someday.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: N102 and I have a conversation about the library.
Teacher, I made a friend!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: We agreed to have some ice cream together next time we meet.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I can't wait!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Which shop are you meeting at?
Can I tag along?
Hehe. It's a secret.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: My friend said it's a popular restaurant that's not easy to find.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I'll go scope it out and if it's delicious, I'll let you know.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Oh wow, I'd love it if you came with us!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure you'll get along with my friend as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Just don't be late!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I talk with N102 about our future plans.
Hi, nice to meet you!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Wait...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: This is strange.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I'm positive this is the first time we've met, but I feel like I've seen you somewhere before.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Are you a celebrity or something?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: A-lister. I've even been on TV a few times.
I'm afraid not.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Wow, that's so cool! I've never met someone who was on TV before.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: You're not famous?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... Then where have I seen you before?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: N102 and I reminisced about the times we had met in the past.
I saw a photo today of someone hanging out in the park, and they looked just like me!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Which is crazy, because I've never been to the park before.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: They really were like a carbon copy of me.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Didn't you go to the park with me before?
That's very interesting.
Are you sure? I'm almost positive I've never been...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Wait, that's it! Maybe you went with the person in that photo.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: We look so similar, it's no surprise that you were fooled.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I want to meet that person!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I know, right? Very interesting...
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I'd really like to meet that person someday.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: How cool would it be to meet your doppelganger?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with N102 about the mystery doppelganger.
Teacher! People say that sometimes it's good to spend time reminiscing about past memories.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: But I... I don't have any to look back on.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: How can I build up more memories?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Even now you're making future memories.
Well...
Even now?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: That's great!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I've got memories now!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Teacher, why do you look so sad?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I don't need memories.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: So don't be sad.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I made some new memories with N102.
Say, do you have any secrets?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: If you do, can you tell me about it and no one else?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Actually, I forget old memories every day.
Actually, I can't eat hot croquettes because they're too spicy.
Huh? What are you saying?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: That's not a secret, that's just a big ol' fib!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Tell me a real secret.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: You mean you can't eat anything spicy either?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Neither can I!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: All right, your secret is safe with me!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: N102 and I share some of our secrets with one another.
Teacher! I woke up and I had chocolates in my pocket!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: But I never brought any chocolates.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Who do you think gave them to me?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Maybe you slept in someone else's clothing?
Aren't those the chocolates I gave you yesterday?
Someone else's clothes?
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Hey, you may be onto something! I think this is the first time I've worn these clothes.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I must have slept in someone else's clothes by mistake.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Ha, nice try!
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I'm not falling for that one.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: Today is the first day we've met.
adviseScripts.speaker: N102

adviseScripts.text: I share the chocolate with N102.
